Mikey Mouse

chapter.paragraph: And this is how the book met the fairy, and how all this story began.
And the book lived a never ending happy life, read, copied and enjoyed by so many readers.

book.author: Donald Duck
book.summary: This book is about the life of a book spent between books who dreamed to meet a fairy who could transform it into an XML book and travel in an electronic boundary-less world.
